review: Iron Fumarate (ferrous fumarate):I have been taking ferrous fumarate and I have had terrible sleep high temperature terrible headache, and black bowel motions. I'm worried about the headaches, and have a temperature from them.. There was no leaflet to say what side affects there were.

I took it for a week and day 2 into it I experienced some crawling like and itchiness of my skin, nausea, green stools , loose stool , abdominal discomfort, poor appetite. My doctor advised me to stop it yesterday.
I have been taking Ferrous Fumarate 210 mg twice a day since last one month but now started have skin rash.  It is red and a lot of itching and sometimes difficult swallowing and hoarseness
